channel.title: MYB

item.title: What The 'Tip And Tail' Release Model Means For The Java Ecosystem
item.description: The "tip and tail" release model represents a significant step forward, offering revolutionary changes that are ambitious but not without challenges.

item.title: Amazon Drones Set To Return To The UK After Near-Decade Wait
item.description: Amazon's delivery drones are set to return to British skies, nine years after they were first trialled near Cambridge.

item.title: Amazon Prime Security Warning As Hackers Strike—What You Need To Know
item.description: Amazon Prime customers have been warned of a new hacking campaign that could cost them dearly—here’s what you need to know.

item.title: Balancing Control And Flexibility: Getting Data Governance Right
item.description: How can organizations ensure robust data governance and security while providing various departments with self-service data access?
